text:
Jordi Mestre Molina (14 September 1981 – 6 June 2020), best known as Jordi Mestre, was a Spanish actor and model. He became famous for his work as reporter on the successful Spanish TV show "Sé lo que hicisteis...". He was born in Esplugues de Llobregat, Province of Barcelona.
Mestre was killed in a motorcycle crash in Madrid on 6 June 2020, aged 38.
